TopicTitle: View Kerbals individual log in flight

Articles.Content: I want know if is possible view individuals log of kerbals first to land at ksc, because sometimes happens that kerbals don't get all the experience, for example with 1 ship with 6 kerbals onboard when they land to ksc 4 get all the experience, 1 left the landing on minmus and 1 left kerbin orbit ......

I was also looking for a feature that shows detailed flight history, but as far as I can tell it does not exist...yet! It does show you some basic info, like how many times you've been in orbit, but nothing that detailed.
Final Frontier keeps track of kerbal achievements, assigning ribbons for SOI, orbit, orbital EVA and surface EVA, if that's useful?

Final Frontier keeps track of kerbal achievements, assigning ribbons for SOI, orbit, orbital EVA and surface EVA, if that's useful?

I have watch for it, but, if i'm not wrong, it assign ribbons after you have landed at ksc
